Package dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl, UserDAOPersistence
    public interface UserDAO
    UserDAO is the interface of the Data Access Object of users.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Ahmed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String createUser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String passwd)
      Creates a new user on the database according to the user's information matching the fields' names.
      boolean deleteUser​(int uid)
      Deletes the user selected by its id.
      java.lang.String editUser​(int uid, java.lang.String passwd)
      Edits the user selected by its id.
      User getUser​(int uid)
      Returns the user selected by its id.
      User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns the user selected by his name.
      java.util.List<User> getUsers()
      Returns the list of all registered users.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        java.util.List<User> getUsers()
        Returns the list of all registered users. If there is not users, it will return a null object.
        Returns:
        the users on the database

      • getUser

        User getUser​(int uid)
        Returns the user selected by its id.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user identifier
        Returns:
        the user object

      • getUser

        User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Returns the user selected by his name.
        Parameters:
        username - the user identifier
        Returns:
        the user object

      • createUser

        java.lang.String createUser​(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String passwd)
        Creates a new user on the database according to the user's information matching the fields' names. If the username is already used it don't finalize the processus. This service is used on the sign-up process.
        Parameters:
        username - a public string identifier of the user
        passwd - the password
        Returns:
        the result message

      • editUser

        java.lang.String editUser​(int uid,
                          java.lang.String passwd)
        Edits the user selected by its id. The username can not be changed.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user identifier
        passwd - new password
        Returns:
        the result message

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser​(int uid)
        Deletes the user selected by its id. A user can delete himself only.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user identifier
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful
